column1: description
A gold ring engraved with a short Àrsaidh inscription. (Light)
A silver sphere with a smooth mirror-like surface. (Light)
A metal bar with spaced incisions—some type of specialized tool? (Light)
A wood-like box engraved with gorgeous geometric patterns. (1 GS)
A 6” concave metal disc that hovers above any surface. It is warm to the touch. (Light)
A flat piece of unbreakable glass(?) in a small silver frame. (1 GS)
An empty vase-like object decorated with a constellation. (1 GS)
A small metal pyramid. A piece of glass protrudes from one of its sides. (Light)
A rigid plastic-like tube that ends in a flexible appendix. (Light)
Small coin-shaped fragments of an unknown, extremely hard material. One side of each is engraved with a sigil. (Light)
A small textured sphere—perhaps an extremely detailed replica of a planet? (1 GS)
A stone cube that fits in the palm of the hand. Confounds KSA scanners. (Light)
A glass-like hexagonal rod, 10” long. It feels sticky to the touch. (1 GS)
A metal rod, a handle at its bottom and a blue sphere at its top. (1 GS)
A fabric-like material, impossible to break. (Light)
A small plastic-like sphere. If it collides with a surface, it bounces and lights up, emitting a clean, bright blue light. (Light)
A small metallic box containing a pink paste. The paste bursts into flames if taken out of the box. (Light)
A 5” metal blade covered in intricate sigils. (1 GS)
A small dodecahedron split in 3 rotating sections. (Light)
A red gem-like stone the size of a fist, beautifully cut. There is a strange flicker within. (Light)
